unnormalised: **Traffic Chaos to Curb? New Rules Rolling Out!**
normalised: Hey folks, buckle up! The R T O is shaking things up with new traffic regulations, effective next month, to finally bring some sanity to our chaotic roads. Forget the relaxed Diwali vibes, this is serious!

unnormalised: Hey folks, buckle up! The RTO is shaking things up with new traffic regulations, effective next month, to finally bring some sanity to our chaotic roads. Forget the relaxed Diwali vibes, this is serious!
normalised: First up, fines for signal jumping are jumping too – expect to shell out around rupee five thousand now. Ouch!

unnormalised: First up, fines for signal jumping are jumping too – expect to shell out around Rs. 5000 now. Ouch!
normalised: Also, they're cracking down on those crazy two-wheeler stunts near I I T Madras. Think twice before showing off!

unnormalised: Also, they're cracking down on those crazy two-wheeler stunts near IIT Madras. Think twice before showing off!
normalised: And get this – helmets are officially mandatory, even for pillion riders. No more excuses during Onam festivities!

unnormalised: And get this – helmets are officially mandatory, even for pillion riders. No more excuses during Onam festivities!
normalised: Speed limits on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway are being reviewed, with possible reductions near accident-prone zones. Expect limits around eighty to one hundred kilometer per hour.

unnormalised: Speed limits on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway are being reviewed, with possible reductions near accident-prone zones. Expect limits around 80-100 kmph.
normalised: The aim? To reduce accidents and make our roads safer, especially with the increasing number of vehicles. So, slow down, drive safe, and maybe grab some biryani to calm your nerves before facing the traffic! It's going to be a ride. Drive responsibly.

unnormalised: The aim? To reduce accidents and make our roads safer, especially with the increasing number of vehicles. So, slow down, drive safe, and maybe grab some biryani to calm your nerves before facing the traffic! It's going to be a ride. Drive responsibly.
